channel.title: Immortal-PvP 317 PI Development Team
channel.description:
[img]http://i52.tinypic.com/oj36ee.jpg[/img]
Owner = The Boss Server Source = Project Insanity Server Client = PI
--------------------------------------- Hello MoparScape, this is my new project called Immortal-PvP. I'm looking to build up a new developing team for my RSPS. Post below if you are interested. We will be in need for a Web Developer, Coder, GFX Team. I will code and host the server.
Server Developers: Open Spot
GFX Team: Open Spot
Client Developers Open Spot
Web Developer: Open Spot
Server Goals: Have a stable and enjoyable server Create a great forums Community Provide People with a place were they can have a good time. Maintain a good player average
Full Screen New Shops All Skills Works No Dupes No Bugs Skillcape Emotes Perfect Combat System 4x Dragon Claws Hits Working Alch Every kill you make you get points to buy things
Pic: [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/2drsxm9.jpg[/img]
[code]How old are you?
Name?
How long have you been Programming?
What are you applying for?
Why should you be in development team?
Why would you like to be part of the team?
Any other information you wish can be added here[/code]
[b]Interested? PM, Reply or add me on MSN Groen_818@hotmail.com[/b]

item.title: Immortal-PvP 317 PI Development Team
item.dc:creator: @promagez promagez
item.description:
@promagez wrote:

How old are you? 13

Name? Rylan

How long have you been Programming? ehh about 1-2 I started at a young age lol

What are you applying for? Source developer/client developer

Why should you be in development team? Because I Can Code Pretty well and i would be a great addition to the team!

Why would you like to be part of the team? I just like helping people with problems or there projects

Any other information you wish can be added here. naw not really

item.title: Immortal-PvP 317 PI Development Team
item.dc:creator: @JavaProgrammer JavaProgrammer
item.description:
@JavaProgrammer wrote:

How old are you: 15

Name: Albert Beaupre (but i prefer anything you call me)

How long have you been Programming: a few days i have gone throught 30 tutorials and i am all to it! I have created tons of thing in eclipse that are working on my server. I am terrible at commands

What are you applying for: To kick other servers in the face! (Server Developer)

Why should you be in development team Because I’m good? Eh I’m not that cocky But I am fully to programming and as I go I will be doing tutorials also

Why would you like to be part of the team: Because I’ve never been part of a team really
and I want to help. Also I’m perfect with [PI] because I’m working on it all the time

Any other information you wish can be added here:
I am on the computer from 5/6pm to 10pm because of schooling
I do not like custom items/maps but I will get the dats for you if you need it,
maybe the anims but i don’t have a dumper.
According to this application I fail but just take me and see how I do if you do not like me than tell me to leave.
If you can explain to me a little more of coding if i leave things out.

Read full topic
